examCategories.description: Exams conducted for recruitment into government services and admission to public universities.

exams.name: Civil Services Examination
exams.purpose: Recruitment for top central government services.

exams.name: IBPS PO Examination
exams.purpose: Recruitment of Probationary Officers in participating public sector banks.

exams.name: SBI PO Examination
exams.purpose: Recruitment of Probationary Officers in State Bank of India.

exams.name: RBI Grade B Officer Exam
exams.purpose: Recruitment for Grade B officer positions in the RBI.

exams.name: Combined Defence Services Examination
exams.purpose: Recruitment for the Indian Military Academy, Officers Training Academy, Indian Naval Academy, and Indian Air Force Academy.

exams.name: National Defence Academy Examination
exams.purpose: Admission to the Army, Navy, and Air Force wings of the NDA.

exams.name: Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering
exams.purpose: Admission to M.Tech programs in IITs/NITs and recruitment in Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs).
rolesOrCourses: Jobs in PSUs like ONGC, BHEL, NTPC

examCategories.categoryName: Private Sector & Higher Education Entrance Exams
examCategories.description: Exams for admission to private universities and specialized postgraduate programs.

exams.name: Common Admission Test
exams.purpose: Admission to MBA and other postgraduate management programs in IIMs and other top B-schools.

exams.name: Xavier Aptitude Test
exams.purpose: Admission to MBA programs at XLRI and over 160 other B-schools.

exams.name: Joint Entrance Examination Main
exams.purpose: Admission to undergraduate engineering programs (B.E/B.Tech) in NITs, IIITs, and other centrally funded technical institutions. Also a qualifier for JEE Advanced.

exams.name: Joint Entrance Examination Advanced
exams.purpose: Admission to undergraduate engineering programs (B.E/B.Tech) in the Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs).

exams.name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test
exams.purpose: Admission to integrated first-degree programs at BITS Pilani campuses.
rolesOrCourses: B.E., B.Pharm, M.Sc. programs at BITS

exams.name: National Eligibility cum Entrance Test
exams.purpose: Admission to MBBS, BDS, and other undergraduate medical courses in government and private medical colleges in India.
